title: enniDam unakku
sahitya:
enniDam unakku irakkam pirakkAmal innum irukkalAmO cenni malai mannavA


anupallavi

  ponnaDi unadai nAn panmurai dinamtOrum ennuLLam urugavE eNNit-tuditta pOdum


caraNam    un tirunAmattinai innalurum pOdu oru murai uraittAlum urutuNai puriyumaiyE
pan murai adanai yAn bhaktiyODurattum payan Edum perAmal ayarvadum EnayyA
